segments.text: Can you believe her ? She is not even a hundred pounds and she is going off on how she wants to go on a diet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tell me about it . If I was as small as her , I wouldn't think about going on a diet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me too . But what are we going to do ? I have been on 4 different diets and I can't seem to lose weight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's because you don't exercise . If you were more active , you wouldn't have a dieting problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you know ? You are over weight too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not on a diet though .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . But I don't have someone to diet with . If we help each other and motivate each other , then I think we can lose some weight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like ice cream too much though .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: C'mon . You'll feel better and look better and as a reward you can eat a little bit of ice cream here and there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a great idea . I can't believe I didn't think of this earlier . Going on a diet with a friend to back you up is a great way to succeed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . I'm in . Let's do it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . I'll get our plan started right away .
segments.speaker: S1
